the,distant,white,walls,promised,rest,and,safety,a,chance,to,heal,and,grow,strong,and,dany,wanted,nothing,so,much,as,to,rush,toward,them,<END>

in,the,back,of,their,wagon,rorge,cursed,and,threatened,and,told,them,to,unchain,him,while,yoren,was,gone,but,no,one,paid,him,any,mind,<END>
kurz,caught,a,fish,with,his,bare,hands,<END>
arya,saw,how,he,did,it,standing,over,a,shallow,pool,calm,as,still,water,his,hand,darting,out,quick,as,a,snake,when,the,fish,swam,near,<END>
it,didn't,look,as,hard,as,catching,cats,<END>
fish,didn't,have,claws,<END>
it,was,midday,when,the,others,returned,<END>

yoren,peeled,a,sourleaf,off,the,bale,<END>
might,be,we,could,swim,the,horses,over,maybe,the,donkeys,but,there's,no,way,we'll,get,those,wagons,across,<END>

that's,gods,eye,with,the,river,flowing,south,<END>

we,follow,the,river,north,should,be,there,before,dark,<END>

he,drew,the,stick,up,through,the,circle,of,the,lake,from,bottom,to,top,<END>

he,tossed,the,stick,down,in,the,mud,<END>

maybe,lady,whent,would,even,help,the,crying,girl,<END>

the,next,day,two,of,them,came,together,to,audience,the,greatjon's,uncles,blustery,men,in,the,winter,of,their,days,with,beards,as,white,as,the,bearskin,cloaks,they,wore,<END>
a,crow,had,once,taken,mors,for,dead,and,pecked,out,his,eye,so,he,wore,a,chunk,of,dragonglass,in,its,stead,<END>

he,was,sending,ser,arys,oakheart,as,her,sworn,shield,and,had,engaged,the,braavosi,to,bring,her,the,rest,of,the,way,to,sunspear,<END>

or,so,he,hoped,<END>
if,lord,stannis,knew,of,this,sailing,he,could,not,choose,a,better,time,to,send,his,fleet,against,us,<END>

at,last,report,the,baratheon,fleet,still,lay,off,storm's,end,where,ser,cortnay,penrose,continued,to,defy,the,besiegers,in,dead,renly's,name,<END>
meanwhile,tyrion's,winch,towers,stood,three-quarters,complete,<END>

the,stink,of,horse,dung,was,heavy,in,the,air,mingled,with,the,woodsmoke,and,the,smell,of,cooking,meat,<END>

they,bowed,their,heads,and,dispersed,while,davos,and,melisandre,rode,to,the,king's,pavilion,<END>
the,tent,had,to,be,large,since,it,was,there,his,lords,bannermen,came,to,council,<END>

an,older,squire,waited,beside,him,<END>

beneath,<END>

the,portcullis,goes,all,the,way,to,the,bottom,<END>
and,the,bars,are,too,closely,spaced,for,even,a,child,to,squeeze,through,<END>
there,was,no,answer,but,a,soft,rustling,<END>
and,then,a,light,bloomed,amidst,the,darkness,<END>
davos,raised,a,hand,to,shield,his,eyes,and,his,breath,caught,in,his,throat,<END>
melisandre,had,thrown,back,her,cowl,and,shrugged,out,of,the,smothering,robe,<END>
beneath,she,was,naked,and,huge,with,child,<END>
swollen,breasts,hung,heavy,against,her,chest,and,her,belly,bulged,as,if,near,to,bursting,<END>
gods,preserve,us,he,whispered,and,heard,her,answering,laugh,deep,and,throaty,<END>
her,eyes,were,hot,coals,and,the,sweat,that,dappled,her,skin,seemed,to,glow,with,a,light,of,its,own,<END>
melisandre,shone,<END>
panting,she,squatted,and,spread,her,legs,<END>

her,cry,might,have,been,agony,or,ecstasy,or,both,<END>
and,davos,saw,the,crown,of,the,child's,head,push,its,way,out,of,her,<END>
two,arms,wriggled,free,grasping,black,fingers,coiling,around,melisandre's,straining,thighs,pushing,until,the,whole,of,the,shadow,slid,out,into,the,world,and,rose,taller,than,davos,tall,as,the,tunnel,towering,above,the,boat,<END>
he,had,only,an,instant,to,look,at,it,before,it,was,gone,twisting,between,the,bars,of,the,portcullis,and,racing,across,the,surface,of,the,water,but,that,instant,was,long,enough,<END>
he,knew,that,shadow,<END>

jon,<END>

the,horn,that,wakes,the,sleepers,he,thought,<END>
the,long,low,note,lingered,at,the,edge,of,hearing,<END>
the,sentries,at,the,ringwall,stood,still,in,their,footsteps,breath,frosting,and,heads,turned,toward,the,west,<END>
as,the,sound,of,the,horn,faded,even,the,wind,ceased,to,blow,<END>
men,rolled,from,their,blankets,and,reached,for,spears,and,swordbelts,moving,quietly,listening,<END>
a,horse,whickered,and,was,hushed,<END>
for,a,heartbeat,it,seemed,as,if,the,whole,forest,were,holding,its,breath,<END>

when,the,silence,had,stretched,unbearably,long,and,the,men,knew,at,last,that,the,horn,would,not,wind,again,they,grinned,at,one,another,sheepishly,as,if,to,deny,that,they,had,been,anxious,<END>
jon,snow,fed,a,few,sticks,to,the,fire,buckled,on,his,swordbelt,pulled,on,his,boots,shook,the,dirt,and,dew,from,the,cloak,and,fastened,it,around,his,shoulders,<END>

he,wished,he,could,move,as,sure,and,silent,as,that,shadowcat,and,kill,as,quickly,<END>

he,wondered,who,would,prove,the,shadowcat,by,night's,end,and,who,the,ram,<END>
for,a,long,way,they,stayed,to,the,trail,following,its,twists,and,turns,as,it,snaked,along,the,side,of,the,mountain,upward,ever,upward,<END>
sometimes,the,mountain,folded,back,on,itself,and,they,lost,sight,of,the,fire,but,soon,or,late,it,would,always,reappear,<END>
the,path,stonesnake,chose,would,never,have,served,for,the,horses,<END>
in,places,jon,had,to,put,his,back,to,the,cold,stone,and,shuffle,along,sideways,like,a,crab,inch,by,inch,<END>

last,night,he,had,dreamed,himself,back,in,the,mill,again,on,his,knees,dressing,the,dead,<END>
their,limbs,were,already,stiffening,so,they,seemed,to,resist,sullenly,as,he,fumbled,at,them,with,half-frozen,fingers,tugging,up,breeches,and,knotting,laces,yanking,fur-trimmed,boots,over,hard,unbending,feet,buckling,a,studded,leather,belt,around,a,waist,no,bigger,than,the,span,of,his,hands,<END>
this,was,never,what,i,wanted,he,told,them,as,he,worked,<END>
they,gave,me,no,choice,<END>
the,corpses,made,no,answer,but,only,grew,colder,and,heavier,<END>
the,night,before,it,had,been,the,miller's,wife,<END>
theon,had,forgotten,her,name,but,he,remembered,her,body,soft,pillowy,breasts,and,stretch,marks,on,her,belly,the,way,she,clawed,his,back,when,he,fucked,her,<END>
last,night,in,his,dream,he,had,been,in,bed,with,her,once,again,but,this,time,she,had,teeth,above,and,below,and,she,tore,out,his,throat,even,as,she,was,gnawing,off,his,manhood,<END>
it,was,madness,<END>

theon,washed,the,sweat,and,sleep,from,his,body,and,took,his,own,good,time,dressing,<END>

well,i,have,a,knife,too,and,know,how,to,use,it,<END>

along,the,walls,figures,half-seen,moved,through,the,shadows,pale,shades,with,long,grim,faces,<END>

and,then,the,tall,doors,opened,with,a,crash,and,a,freezing,gale,blew,down,the,hall,and,robb,came,walking,out,of,the,night,<END>
grey,wind,stalked,beside,eyes,burning,and,man,and,wolf,alike,bled,from,half,a,hundred,savage,wounds,<END>

so,why,don't,you,just,eat,your,broth,like,a,good,girl,and,wait,for,symeon,star-eyes,and,prince,aemon,the,dragonknight,to,come,rescue,you,sweetling,<END>
i'm,sure,it,won't,be,very,long,now,<END>
davos,<END>
blackwater,bay,was,rough,and,choppy,whitecaps,everywhere,<END>
black,betha,rode,the,flood,tide,her,sail,cracking,and,snapping,at,each,shift,of,wind,<END>

his,sons,could,keep,a,line,<END>

across,the,sea,warhorns,boomed,deep,throaty,moans,like,the,calls,of,monstrous,serpents,repeated,ship,to,ship,<END>

lower,mast,<END>
oarsmen,to,your,oars,<END>
his,son,matthos,relayed,the,commands,<END>

ser,imry,had,decreed,that,they,would,enter,the,river,on,oars,alone,so,as,not,to,expose,their,sails,to,the,scorpions,and,spitfires,on,the,walls,of,king's,landing,<END>

from,her,decks,stannis,baratheon,had,commanded,the,assault,on,dragonstone,sixteen,years,before,but,this,time,he,had,chosen,to,ride,with,his,army,trusting,fury,and,the,command,of,his,fleet,to,his,wife's,brother,ser,imry,who'd,come,over,to,his,cause,at,storm's,end,with,lord,alester,and,all,the,other,florents,<END>

above,her,three,hundred,oars,was,a,deck,given,over,wholly,to,scorpions,and,topside,she,mounted,catapults,fore,and,aft,large,enough,to,fling,barrels,of,burning,pitch,<END>

davos,looked,astern,<END>
yes,there,far,to,the,south,that,could,only,be,swordfish,lagging,as,ever,<END>

his,sons,had,given,him,pitying,looks,even,young,maric,<END>
the,onion,knight,has,become,an,old,woman,he,could,hear,them,thinking,still,a,smuggler,at,heart,<END>
well,the,last,was,true,enough,he,would,make,no,apologies,for,it,<END>
seaworth,had,a,lordly,ring,to,it,but,down,deep,he,was,still,davos,of,flea,bottom,coming,home,to,his,city,on,its,three,high,hills,<END>
he,knew,as,much,of,ships,and,sails,and,shores,as,any,man,in,the,seven,kingdoms,and,had,fought,his,share,of,desperate,fights,sword,to,sword,on,a,wet,deck,<END>
but,to,this,sort,of,battle,he,came,a,maiden,nervous,and,afraid,<END>
smugglers,do,not,sound,warhorns,and,raise,banners,<END>
when,they,smell,danger,they,raise,sail,and,run,before,the,wind,<END>
had,he,been,admiral,he,might,have,done,it,all,differently,<END>
for,a,start,he,would,have,sent,a,few,of,his,swiftest,ships,to,probe,upriver,and,see,what,awaited,them,instead,of,smashing,in,headlong,<END>

who,is,this,lowborn,craven,<END>
those,eyes,asked,<END>
is,he,the,one,who,bought,his,knighthood,with,an,onion,<END>

the,starboard,wing,was,taking,all,the,damage,as,he,had,feared,<END>

overnight,the,qartheen,had,come,to,remember,that,dragons,were,dangerous,<END>
